body.name: Aveeno Color Protect & Strengthen+ Blackberry & Quinoa Conditioner (12 Fl Oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 22 hrs 30 mins
features: Oat is the first ingredient in this scalp-soothing, strengthening, farm-fresh inspired conditioner infused with blackberry and quinoa protein to help protect color-treated and heat-styled hair from damage
Blended to help prevent breakage and color fade, these farm-to-shower fresh ingredients work together to help promote a healthy scalp environment while enhancing your hair's natural beauty
Sulfate free conditioner, free from dyes and parabens, making it safe for all hair types including color treated hair
We are inspired by nature; our oat is sourced from a small town mill where pride and quality go hand and hand and we do not test our products on animals

Aveeno is a trusted household brand established in 1945 and is best known for its line of skin soothing products, where oat's natural soothing properties are put to work in body, face and scalp applications
body.description: We believe that beautiful hair starts at the root. Soothe your scalp while helping to protect your hair, with this farm-to-shower inspired Blackberry Quinoa Protein Blend Conditioner. Oat as the first ingredient helps to promote a healthy scalp environment. Infused with blackberry and quinoa protein, this conditioner blend helps to protect color-treated hair from breakage and damage. The blend of ingredients works to produce a sensational, fresh fragrance. Free from sulfates, parabens and dyes, this product is safe for color-treated hair. We source our oats from a quiet mill located along the rolling hills of the Mississippi River Valley, in a small town where pride and quality go hand-in-hand. We love the way we feel when everything is in balance. That's why we start with oat as the first ingredient. Each blend helps to soothe your scalp and nourish your strands from root to tip. Discover blends made with simple ingredients, from simpler times.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aveeno haircare The NEW Aveeno Haircare Collection, formulated with oat and infused with wholesome farm-fresh inspired ingredients help promote a healthy scalp while nourishing your strands from root-to-tip. Oat is at the core of the Aveeno brand heritage...and now, the new Aveeno Haircare Collection. Each new Aveeno shampoo and conditioner contains oat as the first ingredient, which is known for its soothing and moisturizing properties.

Aveeno Oat Milk Blend Aveeno Apple Cider Vinegar Blend Aveeno Fresh Greens Blend Aveeno Blackberry Quinoa Protein Blend Aveeno Rose Water & Chamomile Blend Aveeno Almond Oil Blend Main Benefit Daily Moisture & Light Nourishment Clarify & Added Shine Refresh & Thicken Color Protect & Strengthen Sensitive & Soft Deep Hydration Recommended for Normal hair Oily hair; Normal hair product build-up Normal hair Color-treated or heat-styled hair Sensitive scalp, fine or fragile hair Dry, frizzy, thick, curly hair Details Infused with almond milk, this range provides daily hydration and balanced moisture Clarifies scalp while adding high shine to dull hair Infused with cucumber, rosemary and peppermint, this range refreshes and thickens hair to add volume Preserves hair color, strengthens strands and helps protect against damage from heat styling Infused with rose water and chamomile for sensitive skin and soft cleansing Infused with avocado oil, this range provides deep nourishment while locking moisture into strands Line Features Shampoo, Conditioner, Leave-in-Milk, Overnight Oats Hair Mask Shampoo, Conditioner, In-Shower Rinse Shampoo, Conditioner, 2-in-1 Shampoo, Dry Shampoo Shampoo, Conditioner, Heat Shield Mist Shampoo, Conditioner, Dry Shampoo Shampoo, Conditioner, Hair Mask, Oil Mist

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aveeno Shampoo is the best!
reviews.reviewText: I love the Aveeno brand shampoos. I started off using the Rosemary and Chamomile scent, which smells amazing. This one is ok, not as nice, but definitely smells like blackberries -- so it has a fruity smell with a hint of grains. It does a great job of protecting my copper color that I have my hair dyed -- honestly have been told by my stylist that my color is holding up very well, considering reds tend to fade faster than most. One of the things that I like about this shampoo, is that it is one of the few brands that help with an itchy scalp. I have oily hair but I sweat a lot on my scalp too for some reason, so my scalp gets super itchy. No flakes or anything, just makes me want to scratch my skin like crazy because of dried sweat. This shampoo helps so much with that, neutralizing any itchiness. Some shampoos actually make me itch worse, and this doesn't. It's better than shampoos with teatree oil imho -- which I've also tried. It's also not terribly expensive like some of the salon brands and doesn't have a lot of harsh chemicals, in fact it is sulfate and paraben free, which I also love. My hair feels healthy and shiny and uncoated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is really great works well on my hair the smell is really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have spent way too much money on color safe hair products. This shampoo and conditioner is wonderful. No weird, strong, funky smell and my hair notices the benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different color bottle, not greasy, ok smell
reviews.reviewText: I almost returned the bottle, but noticed the 'new look, same formula' message is reaaaally small print. I actually like the different color bottle to discern shampoo from conditioner.So, it's good conditioner for the price - smells ok, doesn't leave hair greasy. It does create a lot of static and just ok, and works well with the shampoo. I don't use a lot of it and don't leave it in that long, so it works. I have long wavy hair and it leaves it soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a shampoo that is not super expensive high end, this is amazing. My hair feels great and I absolutely love how it smells.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Drugstore Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I have color treated, straight, and thick hair. Ever since I dyed my hair it’s been a nightmare to untangle every time I shower. Before Aveeno I used the pantene color conditioner and it was fine but it was so hard to wash out. Aveeno didn't have this problem. It was easy to rinse out, hydrating to my hair, and made detangling it easier. It also smells so good. I wash and condition my hair everyday so I ran out of this product around 3 weeks in. With its affordable price, I don't mind repurchasing every couple of weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not do its job
reviews.reviewText: It smells great, feels thick enough like it should do the trick, and your hair does feel clean after, but after washing and conditioning, my hair did not feel like it was conditioned at all. My hair was super frizzy, worse than with any other product. I actually wound up having bad split ends within a week after using this line of products. Got my hair cut and switched back to my old stuff I was using for years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best shampoo/conditioners I’ve used.
